mapper.update: merge into event_count_last as a using values (#{domain}, #{instance}, #{event}, #{ymd}, #{hh}, #{mm}, #{total}, #{delta}) as b (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) on (a.domain = b.domain and a.instance = b.instance and a.event = b.event) when matched then update set ymd = b.ymd, hh = b.hh, mm = b.mm, total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.domain, b.instance, b.event, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
mapper.insert: merge into event_count as a using values (#{inst}, #{event}, #{ymd}, #{hh}, #{mm}, #{total}, #{delta}) as b (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) on (a.domain = b.domain and a.instance = b.instance and a.event = b.event and a.ymd = b.ymd and a.hh = b.hh and a.mm = b.mm) when matched then update set total = b.total, delta = b.delta when not matched then insert (domain, instance, event, ymd, hh, mm, total, delta) values (b.domain, b.instance, b.event, b.ymd, b.hh, b.mm, b.total, b.delta)
